modifications.content: <style id="youtube-download-style" type="text/css">.ytd-plus-button {position:relative;top:4px;height:40px;background-image:url('##download-icon-url##');background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:left center;background-color:white;border:none;margin:0 0 0 15px;padding:0 8px 0 25px;text-transform:uppercase;color:black;font-size:1.3rem;font-family:Roboto,​Arial,​sans-serif;font-weight:500;cursor:pointer;opacity:0.5;} .ytd-plus-button:active {border:none;margin:0 0 0 15px;padding:0 8px 0 25px;} .ytd-plus-panel {min-width:69px;display:none;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;z-index:99999;background-color:white;padding:10px 0;box-shadow: 0 2px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 1px 5px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12), 0 3px 1px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)} .ytd-plus-ul {list-style-type:none;padding:0;} .ytd-plus-ul button {width:100%;text-align:left;background-color:white;border:none;padding:15px 15px;font-size:1.3rem;cursor:pointer;} .ytd-plus-ul button:hover {background-color:#eeeeee;}</style>
